meanings.definition: Covered with or consisting of scum
meanings.sent1: The pond water was scummiest after the rain.
meanings.sent2: The scummiest part of the soup was floating on the surface.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally dropped my sandwich in the scummiest water.
meanings.sent4: The scummiest layer on the pond resembled a thick, green blanket.
meanings.sent5: The scummiest film on the water made me cringe.

meanings.definition: Of the lowest kind or quality
meanings.sent1: That movie was the scummiest one I've ever seen.
meanings.sent2: The scummiest behavior is not tolerated in this school.
meanings.sent3: He tried to sell me the scummiest old car for a high price.
meanings.sent4: The scummiest part of the job was cleaning the toilets.
meanings.sent5: The scummiest alley in town was avoided by everyone.
